sentence.Network_en: Give fluid orally or parenterally as necessary to prevent dehydration.
sentence.Network_cn: 必要时,经口或经胃肠道外补给液体,以防止脱水.

sentence.Network_en: The drug is intended to be administered parenterally.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种药本是用于肠胃外的药物.
